message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. It's a steal at this price, if I do say so myself!
I'm really interested in the product, but $20000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $15000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

I understand that $20000 might be a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $18000. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $16000. Would you be willing to come down to that price?

I understand that $18000 is still a bit high for you, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $17000. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal!
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. That's my absolute maximum budget for this product. Can you meet me at that price?
